group.name: defines.command.group
group.doc: Do what your group wants you to do.

attack_area.name: defines.command.attack_area
attack_area.doc: Go to a place and attack what you see.

build_base.name: defines.command.build_base
build_base.doc: Go to a position and build a base there.

none.name: defines.distraction.none
none.doc: Perform command even if someone attacks the unit.

by_enemy.name: defines.distraction.by_enemy
by_enemy.doc: Attack closer enemy entities with force.

by_anything.name: defines.distraction.by_anything
by_anything.doc: Attack closer enemy entities, including entities "built" by player (belts, inserters, chests).

logical_and.name: defines.compound_command.logical_and
logical_and.doc: Fail on first failure. Only succeeds if all commands (executed one after another) succeed.

logical_or.name: defines.compound_command.logical_or
logical_or.doc: Succeed on first success. Only fails if all commands (executed one after another) fail.

return_last.name: defines.compound_command.return_last
return_last.doc: Execute all commands in sequence and fail or succeed depending on the return status of the last command.

on_tick.name: on_tick
on_tick.doc: It is fired once every tick. Since this event is fired every tick, its handler shouldn't include performance heavy code.

on_gui_click.name: on_gui_click
on_gui_click.doc:
Called when LuaGuiElement is clicked. 

Contains

element :: LuaGuiElement: The clicked element.player_index :: uint: The player who did the clicking.button :: defines.mouse_button_type: The mouse button used if any.alt :: boolean: If alt was pressed.control :: boolean: If control was pressed.shift :: boolean: If shift was pressed.

on_gui_text_changed.name: on_gui_text_changed
on_gui_text_changed.doc:
Called when LuaGuiElement text is changed by the player 

Contains

element :: LuaGuiElement: The edited element.player_index :: uint: The player who did the edit.

on_gui_checked_state_changed.name: on_gui_checked_state_changed
on_gui_checked_state_changed.doc:
Called when LuaGuiElement checked state is changed (related to checkboxes and radio buttons) 

Contains

element :: LuaGuiElement: The element whose checked state changedplayer_index :: uint: The player who did the change.

on_entity_died.name: on_entity_died
on_entity_died.doc:
Called when an entity dies. 

Contains

entity :: LuaEntitycause :: LuaEntity (optional): The entity that did the killing if available.force :: LuaForce (optional): The force that did the killing if any.

on_picked_up_item.name: on_picked_up_item
on_picked_up_item.doc:
Called when a player picks up an item. 

Contains

item_stack :: SimpleItemStackplayer_index :: uint

on_built_entity.name: on_built_entity
on_built_entity.doc:
Called when player builds something. 

Contains

created_entity :: LuaEntityplayer_index :: uintitem :: string (optional)tags :: dictionary string â†’ Any (optional)

on_sector_scanned.name: on_sector_scanned
on_sector_scanned.doc:
Called when the radar finishes scanning a sector. 

Contains

radar :: LuaEntity: The radar that did the scanning.chunk_position :: Position: The chunk scanned.

on_player_mined_item.name: on_player_mined_item
on_player_mined_item.doc:
Called when the player mines something. 

Contains

item_stack :: SimpleItemStack: The item given to the playerplayer_index :: uint

on_put_item.name: on_put_item
on_put_item.doc:
Called when players uses item to build something. Called before on_built_entity. 

Contains

position :: Position: Where the item was placed.player_index :: uint: The player who did the placing.

on_rocket_launched.name: on_rocket_launched
on_rocket_launched.doc:
Called when the rocket is launched. 

Contains

rocket :: LuaEntityrocket_silo :: LuaEntity (optional)

on_preplayer_mined_item.name: on_preplayer_mined_item
on_preplayer_mined_item.doc:
Called when the player finishes mining an entity, before the entity is removed from map. 

Contains

entity :: LuaEntity: The entity being minedplayer_index :: uint

on_chunk_generated.name: on_chunk_generated
on_chunk_generated.doc:
Called when a chunk is generated. 

Contains

area :: BoundingBox: Area of the chunksurface :: LuaSurface: The surface the chunk is on

on_player_crafted_item.name: on_player_crafted_item
on_player_crafted_item.doc:
Called when the player crafts an item (upon inserting into player's inventory, not clicking the button to craft). As of 0.11.0, is called for each item crafted as well as what was clicked ("iron-axe" triggers both "iron-stick" with a count of 2 and "iron-axe" with a count of 1, assuming no "iron-sticks" are in the player's inventory)

Contains

item_stack :: SimpleItemStack: The crafted itemplayer_index :: uint: The player who did the craftingrecipe :: LuaRecipe: The recipe that resulted in this item being crafted

on_robot_built_entity.name: on_robot_built_entity
on_robot_built_entity.doc:
Called when a construction robot builds an entity. 

Contains

robot :: LuaEntity: The robot that did the building.created_entity :: LuaEntity: The entity built.

on_robot_pre_mined.name: on_robot_pre_mined
on_robot_pre_mined.doc:
Called before a robot mines an entity. 

Contains

robot :: LuaEntity: The robot that's about to do the mining.entity :: LuaEntity: The entity which is about to be mined.

on_robot_mined.name: on_robot_mined
on_robot_mined.doc:
Called when a robot mines an entity. 

Contains

robot :: LuaEntity: The robot that did the mining.item_stack :: SimpleItemStack: The entity the robot just picked up.

on_research_started.name: on_research_started
on_research_started.doc:
Called when a technology research starts. 

Contains

research :: LuaTechnology: The technology being researched

on_research_finished.name: on_research_finished
on_research_finished.doc:
Called when a research finishes. 

Contains

research :: LuaTechnology: The researched technologyby_script :: boolean: If the technology was researched by script.

on_player_rotated_entity.name: on_player_rotated_entity
on_player_rotated_entity.doc:
Called when the player rotates an entity (including some non-obvious rotations such as with the stone furnace, but not the solar-panel). 

Contains

entity :: LuaEntity: The rotated entity.player_index :: uint

on_marked_for_deconstruction.name: on_marked_for_deconstruction
on_marked_for_deconstruction.doc:
Called when an entity is marked for deconstruction with the Deconstruction planner or via script. 

Contains

entity :: LuaEntityplayer_index :: uint (optional)

on_canceled_deconstruction.name: on_canceled_deconstruction
on_canceled_deconstruction.doc:
Called when the deconstruction of an entity is canceled. 

Contains

entity :: LuaEntityplayer_index :: uint (optional)

on_trigger_created_entity.name: on_trigger_created_entity
on_trigger_created_entity.doc:
Called when an entity with a trigger prototype (such as capsules) create an entity AND that trigger prototype defined trigger_created_entity="true". 

Contains

entity :: LuaEntity

on_train_changed_state.name: on_train_changed_state
on_train_changed_state.doc:
Called when a train changes state (started to stopped and vice versa) 

Contains

train :: LuaTrain

on_player_created.name: on_player_created
on_player_created.doc:
Called after the player was created. 

Contains

player_index :: uint

on_resource_depleted.name: on_resource_depleted
on_resource_depleted.doc:
Called when a resource entity reaches 0 or its minimum yield for infinite resources. 

Contains

entity :: LuaEntity

on_player_driving_changed_state.name: on_player_driving_changed_state
on_player_driving_changed_state.doc:
Called when the player's driving state has changed, this means a player has either entered or left a vehicle. 

Contains

player_index :: uint

on_force_created.name: on_force_created
on_force_created.doc:
Called when a new force is created using game.create_force() 

Contains

force :: LuaForce: The newly created force.

on_forces_merging.name: on_forces_merging
on_forces_merging.doc:
Called when two forces are merged using game.merge_forces(). 

Contains

source :: LuaForce: The force to be destroyeddestination :: LuaForce: The force to reassign entities to.

on_player_cursor_stack_changed.name: on_player_cursor_stack_changed
on_player_cursor_stack_changed.doc:
Called after a players cursorstack changed in some way. 

Contains

player_index :: uint

on_pre_entity_settings_pasted.name: on_pre_entity_settings_pasted
on_pre_entity_settings_pasted.doc:
Called before entity copy-paste is done. 

Contains

player_index :: uintsource :: LuaEntity: The source entity settings will be copied from.destination :: LuaEntity: The destination entity settings will be copied to.

on_entity_settings_pasted.name: on_entity_settings_pasted
on_entity_settings_pasted.doc:
Called after entity copy-paste is done. 

Contains

player_index :: uintsource :: LuaEntity: The source entity settings have been copied from.destination :: LuaEntity: The destination entity settings have been copied to.

on_player_main_inventory_changed.name: on_player_main_inventory_changed
on_player_main_inventory_changed.doc:
Called after a players main inventory changed in some way. 

Contains

player_index :: uint

on_player_quickbar_inventory_changed.name: on_player_quickbar_inventory_changed
on_player_quickbar_inventory_changed.doc:
Called after a players quickbar inventory changed in some way. 

Contains

player_index :: uint

on_player_tool_inventory_changed.name: on_player_tool_inventory_changed
on_player_tool_inventory_changed.doc:
Called after a players tool inventory changed in some way. 

Contains

player_index :: uint

on_player_armor_inventory_changed.name: on_player_armor_inventory_changed
on_player_armor_inventory_changed.doc:
Called after a players armor inventory changed in some way. 

Contains

player_index :: uint

on_player_ammo_inventory_changed.name: on_player_ammo_inventory_changed
on_player_ammo_inventory_changed.doc:
Called after a players ammo inventory changed in some way. 

Contains

player_index :: uint

on_player_gun_inventory_changed.name: on_player_gun_inventory_changed
on_player_gun_inventory_changed.doc:
Called after a players gun inventory changed in some way. 

Contains

player_index :: uint

on_player_placed_equipment.name: on_player_placed_equipment
on_player_placed_equipment.doc:
Called after the player puts equipment in an equipment grid 

Contains

player_index :: uintequipment :: LuaEquipment: The equipment put in the equipment grid.grid :: LuaEquipmentGrid: The equiment grid the equipment was put in.

on_player_removed_equipment.name: on_player_removed_equipment
on_player_removed_equipment.doc:
Called after the player removes equipment from an equipment grid 

Contains

player_index :: uintgrid :: LuaEquipmentGrid: The equipment grid removed from.equipment :: string: The equipment removed.count :: uint: The count of equipment removed.

on_pre_player_died.name: on_pre_player_died
on_pre_player_died.doc:
Called before a players dies. 

Contains

player_index :: uintcause :: LuaEntity (optional)

on_player_died.name: on_player_died
on_player_died.doc:
Called after a player dies. 

Contains

player_index :: uintcause :: LuaEntity (optional)

on_player_respawned.name: on_player_respawned
on_player_respawned.doc:
Called after a player respawns. 

Contains

player_index :: uintplayer_port :: LuaEntity (optional): The player port used to respawn if one was used.

on_player_joined_game.name: on_player_joined_game
on_player_joined_game.doc:
Called after a player joins the game. 

Contains

player_index :: uint

on_player_left_game.name: on_player_left_game
on_player_left_game.doc:
Called after a player leaves the game. 

Contains

player_index :: uint

on_player_built_tile.name: on_player_built_tile
on_player_built_tile.doc:
Called after a player builds tiles. 

Contains

player_index :: uintpositions :: array of Position: The tile positions.

on_player_mined_tile.name: on_player_mined_tile
on_player_mined_tile.doc:
Called after a player mines tiles. 

Contains

player_index :: uintpositions :: array of Position: The tile positions.

on_robot_built_tile.name: on_robot_built_tile
on_robot_built_tile.doc:
Called after a robot builds tiles. 

Contains

robot :: LuaEntity: The robot.positions :: array of Position: The tile positions.

on_robot_mined_tile.name: on_robot_mined_tile
on_robot_mined_tile.doc:
Called after a robot mines tiles. 

Contains

robot :: LuaEntity: The robot.positions :: array of Position: The tile positions.

on_player_selected_area.name: on_player_selected_area
on_player_selected_area.doc:
Called after a player selects an area with a selection-tool item. 

Contains

player_index :: uint: The player doing the selection.area :: BoundingBox: The area selected.item :: string: The item used to select the area.entities :: array of LuaEntity: The entities selected.tiles :: array of LuaTile: The tiles selected.

on_player_alt_selected_area.name: on_player_alt_selected_area
on_player_alt_selected_area.doc:
Called after a player alt-selects an area with a selection-tool item. 

Contains

player_index :: uint: The player doing the selection.area :: BoundingBox: The area selected.item :: string: The item used to select the area.entities :: array of LuaEntity: The entities selected.tiles :: array of LuaTile: The tiles selected.

on_player_changed_surface.name: on_player_changed_surface
on_player_changed_surface.doc:
Called after a player changes surfaces. 

Contains

player_index :: uint: The player who changed surfaces.surface_index :: uint: The surface index the player was on

Note: In the instance a player is moved off a surface due to it being deleted this is not called.

on_selected_entity_changed.name: on_selected_entity_changed
on_selected_entity_changed.doc:
Called after the selected entity changes for a given player. 

Contains

player_index :: uint: The player whose selected entity changed.last_entity :: LuaEntity (optional): The last selected entity if it still exists and there was one.

on_market_item_purchased.name: on_market_item_purchased
on_market_item_purchased.doc:
Called after a player purchases some offer from a Market entity. 

Contains

player_index :: uint: The player who did the purchasing.market :: LuaEntity: The market entity.offer_index :: uint: The index of the offer purchased.count :: uint: The count of offers purchased.

on_player_dropped_item.name: on_player_dropped_item
on_player_dropped_item.doc:
Called when a player drops an item on the ground. 

Contains

player_index :: uintentity :: LuaEntity: The item-on-ground entity.

on_biter_base_built.name: on_biter_base_built
on_biter_base_built.doc:
Called when a biter migration builds a base. 

Contains

entity :: LuaEntity: The built entity

Note: This will be called multiple times as each biter in a given migration is sacraficed and builds part of the base.

on_player_changed_force.name: on_player_changed_force
on_player_changed_force.doc:
Called after a player changes forces. 

Contains

player_index :: uint: The player who changed forces.force :: LuaForce: The old force.

on_entity_renamed.name: on_entity_renamed
on_entity_renamed.doc:
Called after an entity has been renamed either by the player or through script. 

Contains

player_index :: uint (optional): If by_script is true this will not be includedby_script :: booleanentity :: LuaEntityold_name :: string

on_gui_selection_state_changed.name: on_gui_selection_state_changed
on_gui_selection_state_changed.doc:
Called when LuaGuiElement selection state is changed (related to drop-downs) 

Contains

element :: LuaGuiElement: The element whose selection state changedplayer_index :: uint: The player who did the change.

on_runtime_mod_setting_changed.name: on_runtime_mod_setting_changed
on_runtime_mod_setting_changed.doc:
Called when a runtime mod setting is changed by a player. 

Contains

player_index :: uint: The player who changed the settingsetting :: string: The setting name that changed

on_difficulty_settings_changed.name: on_difficulty_settings_changed
on_difficulty_settings_changed.doc:
Called when the map difficulty settings are changed. 

Contains

old_recipe_difficulty :: uintold_technology_difficulty :: uin

Note: It's not guarenteed that both settings are changed - just that at least one has been changed.

on_surface_created.name: on_surface_created
on_surface_created.doc:
Called when a surface is created. 

Contains

surface_index :: uin

Note: This is not called when the default surface is created as it will always exist.

on_surface_deleted.name: on_surface_deleted
on_surface_deleted.doc:
Called after a surface is deleted. 

Contains

surface_index :: uint

on_pre_surface_deleted.name: on_pre_surface_deleted
on_pre_surface_deleted.doc:
Called just before a surface is deleted. 

Contains

surface_index :: uint

on_player_mined_entity.name: on_player_mined_entity
on_player_mined_entity.doc:
Called after the results of an entity being mined are collected just before the entity is destroyed. After this event any items in the buffer will be transferred into the player as if they came from mining the entity. 

Contains

player_index :: uint: The index of the player doing the mining.entity :: LuaEntity: The entity that has been mined.buffer :: LuaInventory: The temporary inventory that holds the result of mining the entity

Note: The buffer inventory is special in that it's only valid during this event and has a dynamic size expanding as more items are transferred into it.

on_robot_mined_entity.name: on_robot_mined_entity
on_robot_mined_entity.doc:
Called after the results of an entity being mined are collected just before the entity is destroyed. After this event any items in the buffer will be transferred into the robot as if they came from mining the entity. 

Contains

robot :: LuaEntity: The robot doing the mining.entity :: LuaEntity: The entity that has been mined.buffer :: LuaInventory: The temporary inventory that holds the result of mining the entity

Note: The buffer inventory is special in that it's only valid during this event and has a dynamic size expanding as more items are transferred into it.

on_train_created.name: on_train_created
on_train_created.doc:
Called when a new train is created either through disconnecting/connecting an existing one or building a new one. 

Contains

train :: LuaTrain

on_gui_elem_changed.name: on_gui_elem_changed
on_gui_elem_changed.doc:
Called when LuaGuiElement element value is changed (related to choose element buttons) 

Contains

element :: LuaGuiElement: The element whose selection state changedplayer_index :: uint: The player who did the change.

ghost.name: defines.controllers.ghost
ghost.doc: Can't interact with the world, can only observe. Used in the multiplayer waiting-to-respawn screen.

character.name: defines.controllers.character
character.doc: The controller controls a character. This is the default controller in freeplay.

god.name: defines.controllers.god
god.doc: The controller isn't tied to a character. This is the default controller in sandbox.

path_lost.name: defines.train_state.path_lost
path_lost.doc: Had path and lost it -- must stop.

no_path.name: defines.train_state.no_path
no_path.doc: Has no path and is stopped.

manual_control_stop.name: defines.train_state.manual_control_stop
manual_control_stop.doc: Switched to manual control and has to stop.

manual_control.name: defines.train_state.manual_control
manual_control.doc: Can move if user explicitly sits in and rides the train.

stop_for_auto_control.name: defines.train_state.stop_for_auto_control
stop_for_auto_control.doc: Train was switched to auto control but it is moving and needs to be stopped.
